parse.title: Duelist Nexus
parse.wikitext:
{{Infobox set | image = DUNE-BoosterEN.png | en_name = Duelist Nexus | fr_name = Nexus du Duelliste | de_name = Duelist Nexus | it_name = Nexus dei Duellanti | pt_name = Nexus Duelista | es_name = Nexus Duelista | ja_name = デュエリスト・ネクサス | romaji_name = Dyuerisuto Nekusasu | ko_name = 듀얼리스트 넥서스 | ko_rr_name = Dyueolisteu Nekseoseu | sc_name = 决斗者之绊 | type = [[Booster pack]] | series = Core Booster | prefix = DUNE | order_number = | size = * 81 (JP, KR) * 100 (''TCG'') * 121 (AE, SC) | cover_card = Cosmic Quasar Dragon | ja_database_id = 1000009000000 | ko_database_id = 1010001272000 | ae_database_id = 5000001301000 | sc_database_id = 3000001272000 | database_id = 2000001272000 | jp_release_date = April 22, 2023 | ae_release_date = December 16, 2023 | kr_release_date = June 24, 2023 | sc_release_date = August 19, 2023 | na_release_date = July 28, 2023 | eu_release_date = July 27, 2023 | oc_release_date = July 27, 2023 | fr/de/it/sp_release_date = July 27, 2023 | pt_release_date = July 27, 2023 | prev = Cyberstorm Access | next = Age of Overlord }} '''''Duelist Nexus''''' is a [[Core Booster]] in the ''[[Yu-Gi-Oh! Official Card Game]]'' (''OCG'') and ''[[Yu-Gi-Oh! Trading Card Game]]'' (''TCG''). It is the 1st Core Booster of [[Series 12]], following ''[[Cyberstorm Access]]''. This is the first Core Booster to be printed in [[Simplified Chinese]], and the first one to be printed in [[Asian-English]] since ''[[Raging Battle]]''. The Korean set was pre-released at the venue of the Korean Yu-Gi-Oh! World Championship 2023 Qualifiers Finals on June 24, 2023.{{cite web | url = https://yugioh.co.kr/board/board_info.php?b_category=notice&b_no=218 | title =「Yu-Gi-Oh! World Championship 2023」 한국 대표 선발전 - 서울 최종전 "듀얼리스트 넥서스" 프리릴리즈 개최! |language = Korean | date = 22 June 2023 | accessdate = 23 June 2023}} It was released to retail on July 5, 2023. == Features == * In the ''[[OCG]]'', the first print runs of ''Duelist Nexus'' boxes include 1 ''[[Duelist Nexus +1 Bonus Pack]]''. In addition, 1 ''[[Hidden Chapter Pack 2023 Vol.1]]'' was given to buyers for every Asian box purchase of ''Duelist Nexus''. * [[Prismatic Secret Rare]]s in the ''OCG'', and [[Starlight Rare]]s in the ''TCG'', are replaced by [[Quarter Century Secret Rare]]s. * Includes cards used by [[Brron, Mad King of Dark World (character)|Brron, Mad King of Dark World]]. ** The ''[[TCG]]'' version also includes cards used by [[Bastion Misawa (manga)|Bastion Misawa]]. * Introduces new members/support for the "[[Altergeist]]", "[[Charmer]]", "[[Dark World]]", "[[Drytron]]", "[[Evolsaur]]", "[[Evoltile]]", "[[Evolution Pill]]", "[[Evolzar]]", "[[Fusion (archetype)|Fusion]]", "[[Mannadium]]", "[[Mikanko]]", "[[Nemleria]]", "[[Noble Arms]]", "[[Noble Knight]]", "[[Phantom Beast]]", "[[Polymerization (archetype)|Polymerization]]", "[[Power Tool]]", "[[Purrely]]", "[[Rescue-ACE]]", "[[Roland (archetype)|Roland]]", "[[Runick]]", "[[Synchron]]", "[[Trap Hole (archetype)|Trap Hole]]", "[[Unchained]]", "[[Unchained Soul]]", "[[Ursarctic]]", and "[[Vaylantz]]" archetypes, as well as the [[Cosmic Synchro Monster]], [[Evol]], [[Gaia Knight]], [[Jar]], [[Monarch]], [[Scrap-Iron]], and [[Trap Monster]] series. ** Introduces the first support for the "[[Infernoble Arms]]", "[[Infernoble Knight]]", "[[Synchro (archetype)|Synchro]]", and "[[Visas]]" archetypes. ** The ''TCG'' version also introduces new members/support for the "[[Magikey]]", "[[Red-Eyes]]", "[[Stardust (archetype)|Stardust]]", and "[[Superheavy Samurai]]" archetypes. * Introduces the [[Chimera (series)|Chimera]] series. ** The ''TCG'' version also introduces the "[[Tistina]]" archetype. * Introduces the [[Illusion]] [[Type]] to the ''[[OCG]]''/''[[TCG]]''. == Breakdown == === Japanese and Korean === * There are 5 cards per pack and 30 packs per box. The set contains 81 cards: ** 1 [[Quarter Century Secret Rare]] ** 9 [[Ultra Rare]]s ** 11 [[Super Rare]]s ** 19 [[Rare]]s ** 41 [[Common]]s * Ultra Rares are also available as [[Ultimate Rare]]. * Ultra Rares and Super Rares are also available as [[Secret Rare]] and Quarter Century Secret Rare. * 1 card is also available as [[Holographic Rare]]. === Asian-English and Simplified Chinese === * There are 5 cards per pack and 30 packs per box. The set contains 121 cards: ** 1 Quarter Century Secret Rare ** 14 Ultra Rares ** 18 Super Rares ** 25 Rares ** 63 Commons * 9 Ultra Rares are also available as Ultimate Rare. * 25 Ultra Rares and/or Super Rares are also available as Secret Rare. * 25 Ultra Rares and/or Super Rares are also available as Quarter Century Secret Rare. * 1 card is also available as Holographic Rare. === TCG === * There are 9 cards per pack and 24 packs per box. The set contains 100 cards: ** 1 [[Quarter Century Secret Rare]] ** 10 [[Secret Rare]]s ** 14 [[Ultra Rare]]s ** 26 [[Super Rare]]s ** 49 [[Common]]s * Ultra Rares and Secret Rares are also available as Quarter Century Secret Rare. == Galleries == DUNE-BoosterEN.png | English
